GET /api.description: Serves up a JSON representation of all available endpoints of the API.

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics.

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Gets an article by its ID.

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Gets all comments from an article

exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars
exampleResponse.body: I hate streaming eyes even more

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a new comment to an article

exampleRequest.body: This is my very fancy test comment.
exampleRequest.author: rogersop

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id/comments.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
